price: 5. Tamah Ni-xaquuk yan caagidi, diggah Nanu farmoytit ruubá kinnino.
arabic: أَمۡرٗا مِّنۡ عِندِنَآۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرۡسِلِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: amran min ʿindinā innā kunnā mur'silīna
